hiveArticle.title: My photography - Mushrooms (Original) 捡磨菇
hiveArticle.body:
I have shoot a lot of mushrooms photos, want to shoot these mushrooms, the best time, after 24 hours of heavy rain,They are usually grown in Bamboo forest,damp,the cool place，There are many varieties of mushrooms, wild mushroom many are toxic and bacteria,So need to dry processing, and then eat,Together to enjoy 以前我也拍过许多的磨菇，想要拍摄这些磨菇，最好的时间，是大雨过后的24小时内，它们一般生长在竹林，潮湿，阴凉的地方或者枯树上，磨菇有许多品种，野生的磨菇许多都有毒性和细菌，所以一般都是晒干加工，再食用，可食用的磨菇都很鲜美，一起来欣赏
This is bamboo mushroom I found in the bamboo forest, is edible, nutrient-rich, the price is also very expensive 这是竹林里发现的竹荪蘑菇，竹荪是可以食用，营养丰富，售价也很贵
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-279.jpg
This mushroom looks good, but I do not know, do not pick it 这种蘑菇长得很好看，但我不认识，不去摘它
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-192.jpg
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-190.jpg
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-191.jpg
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-280.jpg
In our local people called the chicken for grams of mushroom, can eat, after the rain, people will go up the mountain to pick this mushroom 这个在我们这里当地叫人称为鸡枞克的磨菇，可以食用，大雨过后，人们都会上山去捡
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-080.jpg
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-079.jpg
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-078.jpg
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-073-1.jpg
http://steemit.marketing/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/125-077.jpg
无论它们长得有多大，还是多好看, 不要轻易食用不认识的菌类
Hope you like!
